text:
Hey everyone! Today we're learning 
vocabulary around the house

or home with the help of our 
favorite tv series of course.

In case you're new here, we help you to 
learn fast English. Without getting lost,
without missing the jokes, and without subtitles.

Just like Mira who says that she loves every 
single one of our lessons so be sure to hit that

subscribe button and the bell down below so that 
you don't miss a single one of our new lessons.

Do you struggle to understand fast speaking 
natives? Then I highly recommend our Fluent

with Friends course in this 48 week course you 
will learn with the first two seasons of friends

you'll receive pdf power lessons every week 
vocabulary memorization software access to our

Fluency Circle Global community and so much more! 
And did you know you can try it right now for free

with our three-part master class. All you 
have to do is click up here or down in the

description box below to learn more and sign 
up now. We look forward to seeing you there.

If you're enjoying this lesson then 
I highly recommend you watch this

one next where you can learn 
English for at the restaurant

you can click up here or down in the 
description box below to watch that next.

I hope you enjoyed this lesson and have 
learnt lots of new vocabulary pronunciation

and even culture if you enjoy this type of 
lesson then we have some great ones based on

airport vocabulary and also restaurant 
vocabulary that you can check out next.
